name: balena-universal-gosquared
description: A CommonJS wrapper for both Node.js and browser (async) version of goSquared Analytics library

scripts.lint: balena-lint -e js -e ts --typescript src/browser.js src/gs-loader.d.ts src/node.js
scripts.lint-fix: balena-lint -e js -e ts --typescript --fix src/browser.js src/gs-loader.d.ts src/node.js

author: Craig Mulligan <craig@balena.io>
